accent_color_description: Выберите основной цвет, чтобы настроить внешний вид Arcane

common_not_found_description: Запрошенный {resource} не может быть найден или недоступен.
common_delete_confirm: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить {resource}? Это действие нельзя отменить.

common_confirm_destroy_message: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить {type}? Это действие БЕЗВОЗВРАТНО уничтожит связанные ресурсы и его невозможно отменить.
common_confirm_redeploy_message: Вы уверены, что хотите повторно развернуть этот проект? Это приведет к загрузке последних версий образов и пересозданию контейнеров при необходимости.

auth_no_login_methods_description: В данный момент ни один из методов входа не включен. Пожалуйста, обратитесь к администратору.
auth_username_placeholder: Введите имя пользователя или адрес электронной почты
auth_processing_login_description: Пожалуйста, подождите, пока мы завершим вашу аутентификацию.
auth_oidc_invalid_response: Возникла проблема с ответом входа в OIDC. Пожалуйста, попробуйте еще раз.
auth_oidc_misconfigured: OIDC некорректно настроен на сервере. Пожалуйста, свяжитесь с администратором.
auth_oidc_userinfo_failed: Не удалось получить ваши пользовательские данные от OIDC провайдера.
auth_oidc_missing_sub: Ваш поставщик OIDC не вернул идентификатор субъекта.
auth_oidc_email_collision: Учетная запись с вашим адресом электронной почты уже существует, но связана с другим OIDC идентификатором. Пожалуйста, свяжитесь с администратором.
auth_oidc_token_error: Произошла ошибка получения токенов от OIDC провайдера.
auth_user_processing_failed: Произошла ошибка при обработке вашей учетной записи.
auth_unexpected_error: Произошла непредвиденная ошибка. Пожалуйста, попробуйте еще раз.
auth_oidc_provider_error: Аутентификация была отменена или не удалась.
auth_oidc_access_denied: Доступ запрещен. Возможно, ваш логин заблокирован или у вас недостаточно прав.
auth_oidc_invalid_request: Invalid authentication request. Please try again.
auth_oidc_auth_failed: Ошибка авторизации. Пожалуйста, попробуйте еще раз.
auth_oidc_state_mismatch: Security validation failed. Please try logging in again.
auth_oidc_session_expired: Authentication session expired. Please try again.
auth_oidc_user_info_missing: Authentication succeeded but user information is missing.
auth_oidc_callback_error: An error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
auth_oidc_network_error: Network error during authentication. Please check your connection and try again.
auth_oidc_url_generation_failed: Не удается сгенерировать URL аутентификации. Пожалуйста, попробуйте еще раз или обратитесь к администратору.
auth_oidc_init_failed: Failed to initiate OIDC login. Please try again.
auth_oidc_redirecting_description: Пожалуйста, подождите, пока мы перенаправим вас к вашему поставщику идентификации.

environments_remove_selected_message: Are you sure you want to remove the selected environment(s)? This action cannot be undone.

environments_pair_rotate_description: The token is stored securely on the server and not displayed. Use a Bootstrap Token to pair or rotate.
environments_api_url_description: Full URL to the Arcane server endpoint
environments_switch_to_edit_message: In order to change these settings, you must first switch to this environment. Would you like to switch now?
environments_api_url_help: The base URL for the environment's API
environments_warning_disabled: This environment is disabled. You can edit its configuration, but you won't be able to access its resources until it's re-enabled.
environments_warning_offline: This environment is offline or unreachable. You can still edit its configuration and test the connection to diagnose the issue.
environments_warning_no_settings: Unable to load settings for this environment. It may be offline, disabled, or have an invalid URL. You can still edit basic environment details.
environments_local_setting_disabled: This setting cannot be changed for the local environment
environments_health_check_description: Automatic monitoring of environment connectivity and status
environments_health_check_interval_descr: How often to check environment connectivity (in minutes). Default: 2 minutes.
environments_cannot_switch_disabled: Cannot switch to a disabled environment
environments_agent_config_description: Regenerate API key and deployment configuration for this agent
environments_api_key_save_warning: Save this API key - it won't be shown again. Update your agent with the new key.
environments_regenerate_warning_message: Regenerating the API key will invalidate the current key. The agent will need to be updated with the new key to reconnect.
environments_regenerate_dialog_message: This will create a new API key for this environment. The current API key will be invalidated immediately, and the agent will lose connection until you update it with the new key.
users_create_description: Add a new user to your system with the required permissions
users_password_leave_empty: Leave empty to keep current password
users_password_description_oidc: Password is managed by your OIDC provider
users_password_description_edit: Leave empty to keep current password
users_display_name_description: Optional display name for the user

events_subtitle: Monitor events that have taken place in Arcane.
settings_subtitle: Configure and customize your Arcane experience
settings_no_results_description: Try adjusting your search terms or browse categories above.
general_description: Core configuration settings for the application
general_projects_description: Configure where Arcane looks for your Compose files.
general_projects_directory_help: Каталог хранения файлов Docker Compose (это внутри контейнера). ДОЛЖНО быть абсолютным путем!
general_base_url_help: The Base URL for your docker host. Used when opening containers from the service links
general_user_avatars_description: Control Gravatar usage for profile images.
general_enable_gravatar_description: Whether to use Gravatar-based avatars for user accounts
security_description: Configure authentication methods, session timeouts, and other security-related options.
security_local_auth_description: Username and password stored by Arcane. Keep enabled as a fallback.
security_oidc_enabled_description: Allow users to sign in using an OpenID Connect provider
security_oidc_client_secret_help: Leave blank to keep the existing secret
security_oidc_merge_accounts_description: Allow OIDC logins to merge with existing local accounts by matching email addresses
security_oidc_merge_accounts_alert_descr: When enabled, users signing in with OIDC will automatically link to any existing local account with the same email address. This allows users to log in with either method. Existing accounts will gain OIDC access without creating duplicates. Warning: Admin permissions will be overwritten based on OIDC claims during login - local admins may lose privileges if OIDC doesn't grant admin, or regular users may gain admin from OIDC claims.
security_session_timeout_description: Inactive sessions will be logged out automatically (15–1440 minutes).
security_password_policy_standard_toolti: 10+ chars with upper, lower, and a number.
security_password_policy_strong_tooltip: 12+ chars with upper, lower, number, and symbol.
security_enable_one_provider: Enable at least one authentication provider.
security_enable_one_provider_error: At least one authentication provider must be enabled.
security_form_validation_error: Please check the form for errors.
security_oidc_required_fields: Client ID and Issuer URL are required to enable OIDC.
security_local_enabled_info: Local Authentication enabled to ensure at least one provider is active.
jobs_description: Настройте как часто выполняются фоновые задания. Изменения применяются немедленно.
jobs_event_cleanup_description: Как часто тайна удаляет события старше 36 часов
jobs_analytics_description: Работает только в производстве, и только при включенной аналитике
docker_description: Configure Docker automation behavior and settings.
docker_terminal_settings_description: Configure default shell for container terminals
docker_default_shell_description: The default shell to use when opening a terminal in a container
docker_shell_custom_path_help: Enter the full path to the shell executable
docker_cleanup_settings_description: Configure how Docker images are pruned
docker_prune_all_description: Remove all images not referenced by containers and include named, unused volumes during System Prune.
docker_prune_dangling_description: Remove only dangling (untagged) images and anonymous volumes during System Prune.
docker_prune_mode_description: Choose how unused images and volumes should be pruned.
docker_max_upload_size_description: Maximum size in megabytes for image archive uploads (50-5000 MB)
docker_auto_updates_description: Automatically update containers when new images are available
docker_enable_polling_description: Periodically check registries for newer image versions
docker_polling_interval_description: How often to check for new images (5-10080 minutes)
docker_auto_update_description: Automatically update containers when newer images are found
docker_auto_update_interval_description: How often to perform automatic updates (5-1440 minutes)
docker_auto_inject_env_description: Автоматически вводить переменные проекта .env во все контейнеры
docker_rate_limit_warning_description: Polling intervals below 30 minutes may trigger registry rate limits. Prefer longer intervals in production.
navigation_mobile_appearance_description: Configure the visual style and presentation of mobile interface
appearance_description: Customize the look and feel of Arcane
navigation_mode_description: Choose between floating navigation that overlays content or docked navigation that takes up screen space
navigation_show_labels_description: Display text labels below navigation icons for better clarity and accessibility
navigation_desktop_sidebar_description: Configure desktop sidebar behavior and appearance
navigation_sidebar_hover_expansion_descr: When enabled, hovering over the collapsed sidebar will temporarily expand it to show full labels. When disabled, tooltips will appear instead for a cleaner, fixed-width navigation.
disk_usage_settings_description: Configure which directory to monitor for disk usage metrics.
disk_usage_save_failed: Failed to update disk usage path
customize_subtitle: Customize templates, registries, and configuration defaults
customize_try_adjusting: Try adjusting your search terms or browse categories above.
templates_subtitle: Manage compose registries, templates, and defaults
templates_registries_section_description: Connect to remote sources for community and custom templates

templates_community_registry_description: Get started quickly with our community registry containing popular templates:

templates_registry_url_description: URL to the registry JSON manifest
templates_enable_registry_description: Enable this registry to fetch templates
templates_registry_invalid_format: Invalid registry format: missing required fields (name, templates)
templates_choose_description: Browse templates from your registries or local downloads. Scroll to see more, select to use immediately, or download for offline use.
templates_group_by_registry_description: Enable Collapsible Sections for each registry
templates_defaults_description: Customize the default Docker Compose and environment templates used when creating new projects. These templates will be pre-populated in the new project form.
templates_validation_error: Please fix validation errors before saving
registries_subtitle: Configure access credentials for private Docker registries and container repositories
registries_remove_selected_message: Are you sure you want to remove the selected registry(ies)? This action cannot be undone.
registries_credentials_description: Manage authentication credentials for private Docker registries like Docker Hub, GitHub Container Registry, Google Container Registry, and custom registries

registries_auth_notes_bullet_docker_hub: Docker Hub requires credentials for private repositories
registries_auth_notes_bullet_github: GitHub uses personal access tokens as passwords
registries_auth_notes_bullet_anonymous: Some registries support anonymous access for public images
registries_auth_notes_bullet_encrypted: Credentials are encrypted and stored securely

registries_edit_description: Update the details for this container registry.
registries_url_description: Leave empty or use 'docker.io' for Docker Hub
registries_token_keep_placeholder: Leave empty to keep current token
registries_token_description: Use a Personal Access Token or your password if the registry supports it.

git_repositories_subtitle: Настройка подключений репозитория Git для синхронизации Git
git_repository_remove_message: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить этот репозиторий? Это также удалит все соответствующие настройки синхронизации.
git_repository_ssh_key_placeholder: Вставьте ваш SSH закрытый ключ здесь

git_repository_ssh_host_key_strict_descr: Требовать ключ хоста в файле known_hosts
git_repository_ssh_host_key_accept_new_d: Автоматически принимать и сохранять новые ключи хостов в known_hosts

git_sync_remove_message: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить эту конфигурацию синхронизации?
git_sync_import_description: Вставьте конфигурацию JSON ниже или загрузите .json файл.
git_sync_import_missing_fields: Элемент в индексе {index} отсутствует обязательные поля (синхронизация, gitRepo, ветка, dockerComposePath)
git_sync_project_description: Название проекта для создания или обновления из файла создания
git_sync_browse_hint: Только файлы YAML/YML могут быть выбраны в качестве файлов для создания. Нажмите на папки для навигации.

git_managed_readonly_alert: Этот проект управляется Git. Здесь не может быть изменен файл и название проекта. Изменения должны быть сделаны в подключенном Git репозитории.
git_managed_env_note: Окружающий файл (.env) все еще можно редактировать в Arcane, чтобы обеспечить конфигурацию рабочего времени.
git_environment_card_description: Настроить Git синхронизируется для автоматической установки Docker Compose projects из Git репозиториев в эту среду.

variables_duplicate_keys_error: Duplicate keys found. Please ensure all keys are unique.
variables_save_failed: Failed to save. Please try again.

notifications_event_image_update_descrip: Notify when a new image version is available
notifications_event_container_update_des: Notify when a container is actually updated/restarted
notifications_email_tls_mode_description: StartTLS (default) upgrades from plain connection. SSL/TLS uses encryption from start. None uses no encryption.

glass_effect_description: Enable modern glassmorphism design with blur, gradients, and ambient effects
glass_effect_description_long: When enabled, the interface uses frosted glass effects with backdrop blur and subtle gradients. When disabled, the interface uses solid colors and traditional shadows for a classic design. The glass design is in preview, and is subject to change.
first_login_description: For security reasons, you must change the default password before continuing.
first_login_error_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
upgrade_confirm_description: You are about to upgrade Arcane to version {version}.
upgrade_step_pull: Pull the latest Arcane Docker image
upgrade_step_start: Start a new container with the updated image
upgrade_step_preserve: Preserve all your data and settings
upgrade_warning_interruption: This will cause a brief service interruption (~30 seconds)
upgrade_success: Upgrade initiated successfully. Arcane will restart shortly.
upgrade_wait_message: The upgrade is in progress. This may take a few minutes depending on your connection speed.
upgrade_reload_auto: Page will reload automatically in {countdown} seconds
upgrade_remote_description: You are about to upgrade {targetDescription} to v{version}.
upgrade_status_pulling: Downloading new version and preparing to restart...
upgrade_wait_info: This may take 30-60 seconds. The page will reload automatically when ready.
api_key_name_placeholder: Enter a name for this API key
api_key_name_description: A friendly name to identify this API key
api_key_description_help: Additional details about what this API key is used for
api_key_expires_at_description: When this API key will expire. Leave empty for a non-expiring key
api_key_create_description: Create a new API key for programmatic access
api_key_created_description: Скопируйте ваш ключ API сейчас. Вы не сможете увидеть его снова!
api_key_important_warning: This is the only time you will see this key. Make sure to copy it and store it securely.
api_key_page_description: Управление ключами API для программирования доступа к Arcan. Смотрите API Reference для получения информации об использовании.
api_key_delete_message: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить {name}? Это действие нельзя отменить.
api_key_delete_selected_message: Are you sure you want to delete {count} API key(s)? This action cannot be undone.
project_view_description: Switch between classic side-by-side layout and tree view
environments_created_description: Use the API key and deployment snippets below to set up your agent.
environments_api_key_warning: Save this API key securely. It will not be shown again.
environments_create_new_agent_descriptio: Generate an API key and deployment snippets for a new agent.
environments_agent_address_description: The URL where your agent will be accessible
environments_connect_existing_agent_desc: Connect to an already-running agent using a bootstrap token.
